channel.title: Adding new skill in private server
channel.description: Is it possible to add a new custom skill to a private server? If so, I'm interested in getting to know how to do so, since I've tried to do so for days now and can't figure out how to do it. Thank you very much in advance, pik

item.title: Adding new skill in private server
item.dc:creator: @pikkiepauw10 pikkiepauw10
item.description:
@pikkiepauw10 wrote:

hehe i 'll do this later :p…

thanks for you’re help!
and i let you know when i added the skill

Read full topic
